author: jstrachan
msg: Added caching of reply destination, MessageConsumer and MessageProducers together with added new timeout based call() method.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for the creation of temporary topics and queues

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch to avoid using (and changing) the same System.getProperties() object instance - we now create new Properties instances for each SessionFactory

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for adding and removing listeners properly

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied up the code a touch
